property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. {INVASION}-Fire Invaders or Fire Human (When one of your Fire Invaders or Fire Human attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {POWER ATTACKER} +1000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. Then you may put a light creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Your opponent's attacking creatures attack this creature if able. ■ When this creature battles, destroy this creature and your opponent's creature after the battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your fire evolution creatures cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ While battling, this creature can't be destroyed.

property.name: Rules
